00010 const char * const matrix_align1_trans_lower_triangular_substitute_inplace = 
00011 "__kernel void trans_lower_triangular_substitute_inplace(\n"
00012 "          __global const float * matrix,\n"
00013 "          __global float * vector,\n"
00014 "          unsigned int row_length,\n"
00015 "          unsigned int size)\n"
00016 "{\n"
00017 "  float temp;\n"
00018 "  for (int row = 0; row < size; ++row)\n"
00019 "  {\n"
00020 "    if (get_global_id(0) == 0)\n"
00021 "      vector[row] /= matrix[row+row*row_length];\n"
00022 "\n"
00023 "    barrier(CLK_GLOBAL_MEM_FENCE);\n"
00024 "\n"
00025 "    temp = vector[row];\n"
00026 "\n"
00027 "    for  (int row_elim = row + get_global_id(0) + 1; row_elim < size; row_elim += get_global_size(0))\n"
00028 "      vector[row_elim] -= temp * matrix[row*row_length+row_elim];\n"
00029 "  }\n"
00030 "};\n"
00031 "\n"
00032 ; //matrix_align1_trans_lower_triangular_substitute_inplace

00034 const char * const matrix_align1_rank1_update = 
00035 "//perform a rank-1 update of the matrix, i.e. A += x * x^T\n"
00036 "__kernel void rank1_update(\n"
00037 "          __global float * matrix,\n"
00038 "          __global const float * vector1,  \n"
00039 "          __global const float * vector2,  \n"
00040 "          unsigned int matrix_row_length,\n"
00041 "          unsigned int row_length,\n"
00042 "          unsigned int col_length) \n"
00043 "{ \n"
00044 "  float tmp;\n"
00045 "  unsigned int offset;\n"
00046 "\n"
00047 "  for (unsigned int row = get_global_id(0); row < row_length; row += get_global_size(0))\n"
00048 "  {\n"
00049 "    tmp = vector1[row];\n"
00050 "    offset = row*matrix_row_length;\n"
00051 "    for (unsigned int col = 0; col < col_length; ++col)\n"
00052 "      matrix[offset+col] += tmp * vector2[col];\n"
00053 "  }\n"
00054 "};\n"
00055 ; //matrix_align1_rank1_update

00081 const char * const matrix_align1_lu_factorize = 
00082 "__kernel void lu_factorize(\n"
00083 "          __global float * matrix,\n"
00084 "          unsigned int matrix_row_length,\n"
00085 "          unsigned int size) \n"
00086 "{ \n"
00087 "  float temp;\n"
00088 "  unsigned rowi;\n"
00089 "  unsigned rowk;\n"
00090 "  for (unsigned int i=1; i<size; ++i)\n"
00091 "  {\n"
00092 "    rowi = i * matrix_row_length;\n"
00093 "    for (unsigned int k=0; k<i; ++k)\n"
00094 "    {\n"
00095 "      rowk = k * matrix_row_length;\n"
00096 "      if (get_global_id(0) == 0)\n"
00097 "        matrix[rowi + k] /= matrix[rowk + k];\n"
00098 "\n"
00099 "      barrier(CLK_GLOBAL_MEM_FENCE);\n"
00100 "      temp = matrix[rowi + k];\n"
00101 "      \n"
00102 "      //parallel subtraction:\n"
00103 "      for (unsigned int j=k+1 + get_global_id(0); j<size; j += get_global_size(0))\n"
00104 "        matrix[rowi + j] -= temp * matrix[rowk + j];\n"
00105 "    }\n"
00106 "  }\n"
00107 "} \n"
00108 "\n"
00109 ; //matrix_align1_lu_factorize

00111 const char * const matrix_align1_trans_vec_mul = 
00112 "__kernel void trans_vec_mul(\n"
00113 "          __global const float * matrix,\n"
00114 "          __global const float * vector,  \n"
00115 "          __global float * result,\n"
00116 "          unsigned int matrix_row_length, //keep transpose operation in mind!\n"
00117 "          unsigned int vector_length, //keep transpose operation in mind!\n"
00118 "          unsigned int result_length) \n"
00119 "{ \n"
00120 "  for (unsigned int row = get_global_id(0); row < result_length; row += get_global_size(0))\n"
00121 "  {\n"
00122 "    float dot_prod2 = 0.0f;\n"
00123 "    for (unsigned int col = 0; col < vector_length; ++col)\n"
00124 "      dot_prod2 += matrix[row + col*matrix_row_length] * vector[col];\n"
00125 "    result[row] = dot_prod2;\n"
00126 "  }\n"
00127 "};\n"
00128 "\n"
00129 ; //matrix_align1_trans_vec_mul

00131 const char * const matrix_align1_scaled_rank1_update = 
00132 "__kernel void scaled_rank1_update(\n"
00133 "          __global float * matrix,\n"
00134 "          float val,\n"
00135 "          __global const float * vector1,  \n"
00136 "          __global const float * vector2,  \n"
00137 "          unsigned int matrix_row_length,\n"
00138 "          unsigned int row_length,\n"
00139 "          unsigned int col_length) \n"
00140 "{ \n"
00141 "  float tmp;\n"
00142 "  unsigned int offset;\n"
00143 "\n"
00144 "  for (unsigned int row = get_global_id(0); row < row_length; row += get_global_size(0))\n"
00145 "  {\n"
00146 "    tmp = val * vector1[row];\n"
00147 "    offset = row*matrix_row_length;\n"
00148 "    for (unsigned int col = 0; col < col_length; ++col)\n"
00149 "      matrix[offset+col] += tmp * vector2[col];\n"
00150 "  }\n"
00151 "};\n"

00155 const char * const matrix_align1_vec_mul = 
00156 "__kernel void vec_mul(\n"
00157 "          __global const float * matrix,\n"
00158 "          __global const float * vector,  \n"
00159 "          __global float * result,\n"
00160 "          unsigned int matrix_row_length, //keep transpose operation in mind!\n"
00161 "          unsigned int vector_length,\n"
00162 "          unsigned int result_length) \n"
00163 "{ \n"
00164 "  for (unsigned int row = get_global_id(0); row < result_length; row += get_global_size(0))\n"
00165 "  {\n"
00166 "    float dot_prod = 0.0f;\n"
00167 "    for (unsigned int col = 0; col < vector_length; ++col)\n"
00168 "      dot_prod += matrix[row*matrix_row_length+col] * vector[col];\n"
00169 "    result[row] = dot_prod;\n"
00170 "  }\n"
00171 "};\n"
00172 "\n"
00173 ; //matrix_align1_vec_mul

00175 const char * const matrix_align1_unit_upper_triangular_substitute_inplace = 
00176 "__kernel void unit_upper_triangular_substitute_inplace( \n"
00177 "          __global const float * matrix, \n"
00178 "          __global float * vector, \n"
00179 "          unsigned int row_length, \n"
00180 "          unsigned int size) \n"
00181 "{ \n"
00182 "  float temp; \n"
00183 "  for (int row = size-1; row > -1; --row) \n"
00184 "  { \n"
00185 "    barrier(CLK_GLOBAL_MEM_FENCE); \n"
00186 "    temp = vector[row]; \n"
00187 "    //eliminate column with index 'row' in parallel: \n"
00188 "    for  (int row_elim = get_global_id(0); row_elim < row; row_elim += get_global_size(0)) \n"
00189 "      vector[row_elim] -= temp * matrix[row_elim*row_length+row]; \n"
00190 "  } \n"
00191 "   \n"
00192 "}; \n"
00193 ; //matrix_align1_unit_upper_triangular_substitute_inplace
